thread.title: BOSS MBA rankings: The best MBA courses in the country
thread.title_full: BOSS MBA rankings: The best MBA courses in the country | afr.com

author: Beverley Uther and Jessica Yustantio
title: BOSS MBA rankings: The best MBA courses in the country
text:
University of Queensland Business School tops the rankings again. supplied by Beverley Uther and Jessica Yustantio Every two years BOSS undertakes an extensive survey of Australia's business schools and their former students to determine which MBA programs are the best in the country.
Our rankings have a different dimension to those compiled by the likes of The Economist and the Financial Times : we give more weight to what former students say about the value of their study.
The number one ranking goes to The University of Queensland Business School, which first stole the top place in The Â­Australian Financial Review Boss MBA Rankings from Melbourne Business School in 2013.
